full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE LHA RNAM GSUM GYI TSE SGRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI TSE LHA RNAM GSUM TSAR SGRUB 'DOD KYANG SO SOR MI LCOGS PA RNAMS LA'ANG 'JUG PA BDE BA'I PHYIR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DAD BRTZON LDAN PA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG ZLA BAS BSKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BRIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,LO BRGYA 'TSO ZHING STON BRGYA MTHONG GYUR CIG , ,,)
